title: Film Schema
description: A Film. Inherits From 'Star Wars Model'

CastMembers.description: The names of the film's cast memebers. Null for unknown

CharacterIds.description: The id's of the characters featured in this film. Null for unknown

Description.description: A description of the film. Null for unknown

Director.description: The name of the film's director. Null for unknown

Duration.description: The duration of the film in minutes. Null for unknown

EpisodeId.description: The film's episode number. Null for unknown, '-1' for no episode id

FactionIds.description: The id's of the factions featured in this film. Null for unknown

ManufacturerIds.description: The id's of the factions featured in this film. Null for unknown

OpeningCrawl.description: The opening crawl/text of the film. Null for unknown

Producers.description: Them names of the film's producers. Null for unknown

PlanetIds.description: The id's of the planets featured in this film. Null for unknown

ReleaseDate.description: The earliest release date of the film in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Null for unknown

SpecieIds.description: The id's of the species featured in this film. Null for unknown

StarshipIds.description: The id's of the starships featured in this film. Null for unknown

Title.description: The title of the film. Null for unknown

VehicleIds.description: The id's of the vehicles featured in this film. Null for unknown

WeaponIds.description: The id's of the weapons featured in this film. Null for unknown
